articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on September 3.
					 In the message the president said he was pleased to send sincere congratulations to His Excellency Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 He sincerely wished His Excellency good health and his friendly people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Syrian Arab Republic will further develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in conformity with the common interests of the two friendly peoples.
					
					 The message extended the highest tribute to His Excellency Marshal.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban State Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban State Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with a Cuban state delegation headed by Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, first vice-president of the Council of State and first vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.
					 Present there were Ri Su Yong, foreign minister, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who doubles as chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, and officials concerned.
					
					 Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez said:
					
					 The friendly relations between the two countries provided by the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il together with Comrades Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz are steadily developing under the special care of Comrade Kim Jong Un and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 Cuba and the DPRK are far away from each other geographically but they are firmly united thanks to the common idea and friendship and the two peoples are comrades-in-arms standing together on the forefront for independence against imperialism, he said.
					
					 He expressed thanks to the Workers' Party and government of Korea for extending solidarity to the Cuban people in the struggle to shatter the U.S. blockade against Cuba, adding Cuba is always fully supporting the DPRK's cause.

articles.title: Cuban State Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Cuban State Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A state delegation of the Republic of Cuba headed by Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, first vice-president of the Council of State and first vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Saturday.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, the guests looked round the historic relics preserved with much care at his old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, etc.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Meets Cuban Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Cuban Delegation
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with a state delegation of the Republic of Cuba headed by Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, first vice-president of the Council of State and first vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Returns Home
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Returns Home
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus led by Jang Ryong Sik, its head and chief conductor, returned home by air on Friday after visiting Russia.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan arrived here Saturday to celebrate the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK. It is headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 Members of the group laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Russia-Korea Friendship Classroom Appears in Russia
articles.content:
Russia-Korea Friendship Classroom Appears in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- There took place a ceremony of naming the Russia-Korea Friendship Classroom at Middle School No. 5 in Khabarovsk City of Russia on September 1. Displayed on the front wall of the classroom were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a picture of Marshal Kim Jong Un among children. 
					 On display there were the tablet reading "Russia-Korea Friendship Classroom" and photos and art pieces introducing the DPRK. 
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made. 
					
					 The mayor of Khabarovsk City said he was very pleased that portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a picture of Kim Jong Un were displayed in the classroom of the school and it was named the Russia-Korea Friendship Classroom in the year of Russia-Korea friendship. 
					
					 This will make a positive contribution to the development of the traditional Russia-Korea friendship, he said, and went on:
					
					 Through the operation of the friendship classroom Russian students will properly understand the DPRK dynamically advancing along the way chosen by itself despite harsh sanctions and pressure of outside forces. 
					
					 The friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries who forged militant friendship while fighting against the common enemy in the same trench will grow stronger. 
					
					 A gold-plated key, symbol of the friendship classroom, was conveyed to the principal of the school. 
					
					 The participants in the ceremony watched a video on the camping of students of the school at the Songdowon International Children's Camp and enjoyed an art performance. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Khabarovsk City Administration and Middle School No. 5 in the city and masses.
					
					 Officials of the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk were present there on invitation.

articles.title: 40-ton Crane for Container Manufactured
Park of Waterworks and Flowers Built in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Park of Waterworks and Flowers Built in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Park of Waterworks and Flowers has taken its shape in the central part of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The park consists of large-size waterworks, resting sites of various types, 3 000 square meters of flowerbeds and lawns.
					
					 In the park there are eight flower stands, on which various species of flowers are coming into full bloom.
					
					 Seen in the park are newlyweds posing for pictures and other citizens enjoying themselves.
					
					 The newly-built park adds beauty to the scenic city.

articles.title: Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital
articles.content:
Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital in the DPRK has made signal achievements in treating ophthalmic cases since its birth ten years ago.
					 According to Director Ryu Un Hui, the hospital recently cured more than 40 little patients through the application of a special strabotomy method.
					
					 And it succeeded in restoring high myopia cases to normal sight by introducing phakic iris claw intra-ocular lens operation method.
					
					 It also applied advanced laser therapy and stem cell transplant operations in treating cataract and glaucoma cases.
					
					 Kim Man Sok, section chief of the hospital, told KCNA that the hospital has cured more than 600 patients by means of peculiar vitreous retina operation.
					
					 The hospital provides by itself medicines and medical apparatuses, including artificial crystalline lens, while strengthening cooperation with other countries and international bodies.
					
					 The universal, free medical care has been enforced in the DPRK since 1952.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dialogue and Negotiations to Settle Issues
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dialogue and Negotiations to Settle Issues 
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- All compatriots wish to see the north and the south value the spirit of the agreement reached at a high-level urgent contact and realize dialogue and negotiations in various fields and thus advance the inter-Korean relations in the direction of achieving the independent reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article on Saturday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Dialogue and negotiations between the north and the south are an important way of radically developing the present north-south relations which have been put on the track of dramatic turn from the worst catastrophe.
					
					 It is the DPRK's consistent stand to seek a negotiated solution of issues.
					
					 The Korean nation is more interested in peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula than any others.
					
					 It is not the two different nations that are standing in confrontation in the north and the south, but one homogenous nation which was deliberately split by foreign forces. If a war breaks out once again on the Korean Peninsula, it will bring more horrible disaster than what the Koreans suffered during the past Korean War. The Koreans never want to see the escalation of the north-south standoff as they have been exposed to constant danger of a war. 
					
					 Dialogue and negotiations between the north and the south are in full line with the desire of the Korean nation for reconciliation and peace, not confrontation and war, as they provide a course of wiping out distrust, building confidence and achieving common prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK advanced the line of one Korea and reunification reflecting the long-cherished desire of the compatriots for national reunification and has made positive efforts to solve the matters arising in the north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations and to promote the reconciliation, unity, cooperation and exchange of the nation.
					
					 Difficulties and trials lie in our way, but we will make sincere efforts to clear hurdles and bring about a great turn and change in the north-south relations through dialogue and negotiations, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korea Not to Do Foul Behavior
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korea Not to Do Foul Behavior 
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Now south Korean conservative media recklessly take issue with the north, talking about "the north's dismantlement of its nukes" and "provocation possibility in October." They brand reunion of the separated families and relatives as "north's trite card for negotiation." The "General Federation for Freedom," the "Association of Reservists of south Korea" and other conservative organizations vie with each other to say that they would force the north to "pay dearly" and "vicious circle of provocation." Even those human scum are running wild with anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation. 
					 These are sinister behavior to trample down the bud of improvement of the north-south relations, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary. 
					
					 Looking back upon the past, the ultra-right conservative elements in south Korea have chilled the enthusiasm of Koreans for reunification, slandering the north categorically and hindering the authorities whenever there is a sign for improvement of the inter-Korean relations, the news analyst says, and continues:
					
					 Now is the time to think twice before talking a word and doing one action in the spirit of the north-south agreement and maintain the situation well. 
					
					 Media is more important. The basic position of media is to clearly see the reality and report the truth from the point of view of a fair deal and promote the improvement of the north-south relations. 
					
					 However, the conservatives of south Korea are impudent. 
					
					 Now is the time responsible for the north and the south authorities. If they have a sense of obligation for the destiny of the nation, they should stop sinister behavior hurting the fellow countrymen in the north and blocking the improvement of the north-south relations and positively join in the trend of dialogue and peace. 
					
					 All Koreans are watching for the south.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Wrecker of Peace and Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Wrecker of Peace and Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- All  countries and nations should  clearly understand that the U.S. is not a peace and human rights champion but its wrecker and abuser because it is important for preventing  a war and preserving social stability, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 Citing facts to prove that it is a stereotyped method and chronic evil practice of the U.S. imperialists to deceive the international community through lies, deception and fraud, to infringe upon the sovereignty of other countries and nations by such means as military interference and war and to wreck global peace and security, the article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is not willing to ignite a war against other counties, single-handed.
					
					 The U.S. is disturbing peace and abusing human rights by joining its allies in drubbing other countries. An ulterior aim sought by it in doing so is to convince the international community that it is not a criminal state engrossed in wrecking peace and abusing human rights. If one fails to see through such sinister scenario, one cannot but allow oneself serving as cannon fodder for the U.S. and shock brigade for helping it carry out its strategy to dominate the world and become its puppet.
					
					 If one is taken in by the U.S. lies and false propaganda, this will be tantamount to allowing the U.S. to style itself "a champion of peace and human rights" and this will entail serious consequences of disturbing peace and security in the region and other parts of the world.
					
					 All the counties which love peace and value human rights should clearly see through the U.S. criminal scenario and intensify actions to check and foil it.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked in Malaysia, Ethiopia
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked in Malaysia, Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- There took place round-table talks in Malaysia and Ethiopia on August 31 with the approach of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The director of a Malaysian company said President Kim Il Sung was the iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated two imperialist powers in one generation and the great leader who founded the DPRK and led it to victory and prosperity.
					
					 He was the elder statesman in the world recognized and revered by all people, the director added.
					
					 Speakers at the round-table talks held in Ethiopia said the DPRK founded by Kim Il Sung is the genuine country of the people as it pursues policies for them. The Korean people are the happiest one in the world as they enjoy a dignified life as the proud master of the state, the speakers stressed.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked in Various Countries 
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- There took place an opening ceremony of a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Bulgaria, a meeting and book exhibition in Ecuador and film show in Iran on August 29 and 31 with the approach of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					 On display at the venues of the events were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books on their greatness and books and photos introducing the victorious and glorious course of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched the Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victory by Dint of Single-minded Unity".
					
					 A Bulgarian city mayor said he was sincerely pleased that the Korean people are achieving successes in the drive for social progress, expressing belief that they would achieve prosperity in the future, too, on the road chosen by themselves. 
					
					 The chairman of the Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador said the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by liberating the Korean people from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, founding the DPRK and building Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, will shine forever. 
					
					 The President will always be alive in the hearts of the world progressives as he devoted himself to the freedom and happiness of the people and the cause of global independence, the chairman added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Romanian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Romanian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania posted an article titled "Founder of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on its website Juche Idea on August 31 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The article said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people, is the founder of the DPRK.
					
					 The President explored the way of building a people's power which protects and meets the interests of the people from all walks of life including workers, farmers and intellectuals from an independent stand, not wedded to the established theories or experience of other countries, prompted by his far-reaching plan to build a country of the people in Korea in his early years.
					
					 Under the grave situation the President worked heart and soul to frustrate the U.S. moves to split the Korean nation and firmly unite all the patriotic forces in the north and the south under the banner of national independence.
					
					 As a result, the historic Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea was held in Pyongyang in April, 1948.
					
					 The unity of the patriotic democratic forces in the north and the south served as a socio-political foundation for establishing a unified democratic government and at last the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East, was founded on September 9, 1948.
					
					 The President had led the country and its people as the top leader of the DPRK for a long period.
					
					 We pay high tribute to the President on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK which has demonstrated its dignity as an invincible socialist power.

articles.title: Anniversary of Founding of DPRK Observed by Myanmar Personages
articles.content:
Anniversary of Founding of DPRK Observed by Myanmar Personages
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar released statements on Aug. 29 and 31 to observe the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said it was a great event that President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK on September 9, 1948, adding:
					
					 The DPRK turned into a political and ideological power and a military power in which all people are single-mindedly united under the leadership of the President and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is steering the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country to victory.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the final victory and only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, praised the DPRK founded and developed by the President and Kim Jong Il for always emerging victorious under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, expressing belief that the Korean people dynamically advancing under the unfurled banner of socialism and independence against imperialism would surely win victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente sirio
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion estatal de Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion estatal de Cuba
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 5 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion estatal de Cuba, encabezada por Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y primer vicepresidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, que le hizo una visita de cortesia, y departio en un ambiente amistoso.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte Ri Su Yong, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y titular del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Ri Kwang Gun, viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					En la audiencia, Miguel dijo que las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises preparadas por los lideres de los dos paises se fortalecen y se desarrollan bajo la peculiar atencion del estimado camarada Kim Jong Un y el camarada Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Apunto que aunque Cuba y la RPDC se hallan muy distanciadas geograficamente, estan unidas solidamente con la ideologia comun y el sentimiento de amistad. Y agrego que los pueblos de ambos paises se encuentran en la misma trinchera de independencia antiimperialista.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento de que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC expresaron la solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo cubano para frustrar el bloqueo anti-cubano de EE.UU. 
					
					Puntualizo que Cuba siempre apoya enteramente la causa de la RPDC.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju se reune con delegacion estatal de Cuba
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju se reune con delegacion estatal de Cuba
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea departio el dia 5 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae, con la delegacion estatal de la Republica de Cuba encabezada por Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y primer vicepresidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Efectuado en Rusia acto de denominacion de Clase de Amistad Rusia-Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado en Rusia acto de denominacion de Clase de Amistad Rusia-Corea
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en la Escuela Secundaria No. 5 de la ciudad de Jabarovsk el acto de denominacion de la Clase de Amistad Rusia-Corea, donde estan colocados los retratos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa y la foto del Mariscal Kim Jong Un encontrandose junto con los ninos.
					En el lugar de acto estaban colgados el letrero de "Clase de Amistad Rusia-Corea", las fotos y las obras de bellas artes que dan a conocer la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Quedo declarada la denominacion de la Clase de Amistad Rusia-Corea de la Escuela Secundaria No. 5 de la ciudad de Jabarovsk.
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones.
					
					El alcalde de Jabarovsk dijo que se sentia muy alegre de que en este ano de amistad Rusia-Corea se denomino la Clase de Amistad Rusia-Corea tras colocarse en la clase de la Escuela Secundaria No. 5 de la ciudad de Jabarovsk los retratos con amplia sonrisa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, grandes lideres de Corea y la foto del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y continuo:
					
					Esta ocasion aportara mucho al desarrollo de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad Rusia-Corea.
					
					A traves de la gestion de la Clase de Amistad, los alumnos rusos tendran la comprension correcta sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que avanza siempre por el camino optado por si mismo en medio de las severas sanciones y presiones de las fuerzas exteriores.
					
					Se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de ambos paises trabadas en la misma trinchera contra el enemigo comun.
					
					En el acto fue entregado al director de la escuela la llave dorada, simbolo de la Clase de Amistad.
					
					Los participantes en el acto presenciaron el video que muestra el campismo de los alumnos de la Escuela Secundaria No. 5 de la ciudad de Jabarovsk en el Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon y una funcion artistica.
					
					En el acto estuvieron presentes las personalidades de la administracion de la ciudad de Jabarovsk y de la escuela arriba mencionada y los habitantes de la misma ciudad y fueron invitados los funcionarios de la representacion de la RPDC en esta ciudad rusa.
